Package src

Class SwingCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • src.SwingCalendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class SwingCalendar
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    SwingCalendar extends JPanel, and is used to display the calendar, which can be shown in a JFrame.

    This SwingCalendar has two different view:

    • Month
    • Week
    Author:
    Tam Thai Hoang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) java.util.Calendar cal
      cal is the Calendar to get calendar information.
      private java.lang.String[] columns
      columns is used to display the day of week in month view.

      exportButton is the JButton to export the calendar to a PDF file.

      LEFT is the int left for the left button to go to the previous month/week.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.List<MonthCell>> monthData
      monthData is the ArrayList<List> of MonthCells to be displayed in the calendar.
      private MonthTableModel monthModel
      monthModel is the MonthTableModel to display month table.
      private javax.swing.JScrollPane pane
      pane is the JScrollPane view the calendar with a scroll bar.

      RIGHT is the int right for the right button to go to the next month/week.

      table is the JTable to show the calendar.

      today is the current Date at runtime.

      view is the view of SwingCalendar.

      viewComboBox is the JComboBox to select the view of SwingCalendar.

      monthData is the ArrayList<List> of MonthCells to be displayed in the calendar.
      private java.lang.String[] weekDate
      weekDate is used to display the week date in week view.
      private WeekTableModel weekModel
      weekModel is the WeekTableModel to display week table.
